div.ab:
ويتفضّــل مقتضاه بالأذان في الصّوامع والصّلاة في المساجد وإقــامة الخطبة في الجمع والأعــيادِ وغير ذلك
أيّــة دوابّ ولا غير ذلك من الــكلف إلّا إن حدث فساد في بعض البلاد الّتِي من بلنسية إلى بيار فله حشدهم لذلك وعلى أن يكــونوا مُأَمّنِين في
نفوسهم وأموالهم فــلا اعتراض عليه في ملــكـِـهِ ومَن كان من خواص النّاس ووجوههم فيخفر في البر والبحر ويوصل إلى مــقصــوده من البلاد والأقاليم و
الحصون والقصاب والمدن والقرى والسواحل والموانئ ويحــكم ڤي النــوازل الحادثة پعد انقضا الامَدِ بينهم وبين النصارى بشهادة شاهدين مرضيين مسلم وپصــراني ولا پواحد فما فوقه من
ولا يحكم بتأديبه إن أخــفى أسيرًا من المسلمين وأن يجبر على صاحبه الأسير إن عُثِر عليه وعلى الملك أيّده اللّه قتل من يغير على المسلميــن فــلــو قتله مسلم سقط حقن
قتله دمه وأن يــكلّف المسلمين بنآءً في القصبة ويكونون على اختيارهم في بنآءِ سور الجفنةِ والمدنية والمدينة ولا يجبرون عليه ولا يمنعون منه وعلى أن يبادي للملكِ
ببناء القصبة والأسوار من قبل ولَه زكاة الماشية على سنّةِ للمسلمين ولا يبقى رسم من رسوم القبالاتِ المحدثة في الأسواق برسم السّور وغيــر ذلك
ولزم الــملك أيّده اللّه هذه المعاهدة على شروطها والملكة المعظّمة دونة إِيأُليش ولزم ذلك أيضا ابنه الإفَــانــت دون أدفونش وجميع عقيبه
وحلفو على الوفاء بها بالجميع مــن المملكة باللّه العظيم وبالصّليب والإنجيل وبكل ما لا يصح الحنث للحالف به في ملّته والتزم الملك أيّده اللّه وخليفه الإفانت ابنه وخلــفاؤه
بالجميع ما ذكر ولزم القائدين أعزّهما اللّه هذه المعاهدة على شروطها ولزم ذلك أيضا من كان من خواصّ النّاس ووجوه شــاطبة وما إليــها وألزموها من وراءَهم من طبقاتِ النّاس وحلفوا على الوفاءِ بها باللّه الكَــريم ومحمّد رسوله صلّى اللّه عليه وسلّم
وبالقرآن الّذي أنزل عليه والتزم القائدان أعزّهما اللّه وجميع عقيبهما بالجميع ما ذكر باللّه ســبحانه وكل من حضر وكتب القائدان أعزّهما اللّه وسائــر من حضر أسماءهم أسفل استصدر في يــوم الأحد الخامــس والـ]ـعشرين لشهر ذي الحجّة
عام أحد وأربعين وستّمائة وذَلك للــملــك أيّــده اللّه وأن يبقى بأيدي المسلمين كل مَا بأيديهم من أسَارى النّصارى في الأمدِ وبعده ولا يعترضون في الأمد وبعده
شهد على ذلك ومحمّد بن أحمد بن محمّد بن أحمد بن عيسى الأنصاري ومحمّد بن عبد اللّه بن يعقوب ومحمّد بن طلحة بن يعقوب بن طلحة وعبد السّلام بن يوسف

*** wa yatafaḍḍalu muqtaḍā hu bi ăl ʾaḏāni fī ăṣ ṣawāmiʿi wa ăṣ ṣalāẗi fī ăl masāǧidi wa ʾiqāmaẗi ăl ḫuṭbaẗi fī ăl ǧumaʿi wa ăl ʾaʿyādi wa ġayri ḏālika ***
*** ʾayyaẗa dawābb:in wa lā ġayra ḏālika mina ăl kulafi ʾillā ʾin ḥadaṯa fasād:un fī baʿḍi ăl bilādi ăllatī min balansiyaẗa ʾilà biyāra biyar:in fa la hu ḥašdu hum li ḏālika wa ʿalà ʾan yakūnū muʾammanīna fī
nufūsi him wa ʾamwāli him *** fa lā ĭʿtirāḍa ʿalay hi fī milki hi wa man kāna min ḫawāṣṣi ăn nāsi wa wuǧūhi him fa yuḫfaru fī ăl barri wa ăl baḥri wa yūṣalu ʾilà maqṣūdi hi mina ăl bilādi wa ăl ʾaqālīmi wa ăl ḥuṣūni
wa ăl qiṣābi wa ăl muduni wa ăl qurà wa ăs sawāḥili wa ăl mawāniʾi *** wa yuḥkamu fī ăn nawāzili ăl ḥādiṯaẗi baʿda ĭnqiḍāʾi ăl ʾamadi bayna hum wa bayna ăn naṣārà bi šahādaẗi šāhidayni marḍiyyayni muslim:in wa naṣrāniyy:in wa lā bi wāḥid:in fa mā fawqa hu mina ăš šuhūdi
*** wa lā yuḥkamu bi taʾdībi hi ʾin ʾaḫfà ʾasīr:an mina ăl muslimīna wa ʾan yuǧbara ʿalà ṣāḥibi hi ăl ʾasīru ʾin ʿuṯira ʿalay hi wa ʿalà ăl maliki ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu qatlu man yuġīru ʿalà ăl muslimīna fa law qatala hu muslim:un saqaṭa ḥuqina
qatlu damu hu wa ʾan yukallifa ăl muslimīna bināʾ:an fī ăl qaṣbaẗi wa yakūnūna ʿalà ĭḫtiyāri him fī bināʾi sūri ăl ǧafnaẗi wa ăl madīnaẗi wa lā yuǧbarūna ʿalay hi wa lā yumnaʿūna min hu wa ʿalà ʾan yubādiya li l maliki
bi bināʾi ăl qaṣbaẗi wa ăl ʾaswāri *** min qabl:in wa la hu zakāẗu ăl māšiyaẗi ʿalà sunnaẗ:in li l muslimīna wa lā yabqà rasm:un min rusūmi ăl qabālāti ăl muḥdaṯaẗi fī ăl ʾaswāqi bi rasmi ăs sūri wa ġayri ḏālika ***
*** wa lazima ăl maliku ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu hāḏihi ăl muʿāhadaẗa ʿalà šurūṭi hā wa ăl malikaẗu ăl muʿaẓẓamaẗu dūnaẗu ʾīʾulīšu wa lazima ḏālika ʾayḍ:an ĭbnu hu ăl ʾifāntu dūn ʾadfūnšu wa ǧamīʿu ʿaqībi hi
*** wa ḥalafū ʿalà ăl wafāʾi bi hā bi ăl ǧamīʿi mina ăl mamlakaẗi bi ăl lāhi ăl ʿaẓīmi wa bi ăṣ ṣalībi wa ăl ʾinǧīli wa bi kulli mā lā yaṣiḥḥu ăl ḥinṯu li l ḥālifi bi hi fī millati hi wa ĭltazama ăl maliku ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu wa ḫalīfu hu ăl ʾifāntu ĭbnu hu wa ḫulafāʾu hu
bi ăl ǧamīʿi mā ḏukira wa lazima ăl qāʾidayni ʾaʿazza humā ăl lāhu hāḏihi ăl muʿāhadaẗa ʿalà šurūṭi hā wa lazima ḏālika ʾayḍ:an man kāna min ḫawāṣṣi ăn nāsi wa wuǧūhi šāṭibaẗa wa mā ʾilay hā wa ʾalzamū hā man warāʾa hum min ṭabaqāti ăn nāsi wa ḥalafū ʿalà ăl wafāʾi bi hā bi ăl lāhi ăl karīmi wa muḥammad:in rasūli hi ṣallà ăl lāhu ʿalay hi wa sallama
wa bi ăl qurʾāni ăllaḏī ʾanzala ʿalay hi wa ĭltazama ăl qāʾidāni ʾaʿazza humā ăl lāhu wa ǧamīʿu ʿaqībi himā *** bi ăl ǧamīʿi mā ḏukira bi ăl lāhi subḥāna hu wa kullu man ḥaḍara wa kataba ăl qāʾidāni ʾaʿazza humā ăl lāhu wa sāʾiru man ḥaḍara ʾasmāʾa hum ʾasfala ŭstuṣdira fī yawmi ăl ʾaḥadi ăl ḫāmisi wa ăl ʿišrīna li šahri ḏī ăl ḥiǧǧaẗi
ʿāma ʾaḥad:in wa ʾarbaʿīna wa sitti miʾaẗ:in *** wa ḏālika li l maliki ʾayyada hu ăl lāhu wa ʾan yabqà bi ʾaydī ăl muslimīna kullu mā bi ʾaydī him min ʾasārà ăn naṣārà fī ăl ʾamadi wa baʿda hu wa lā yaʿtariḍūna fī ăl ʾamadi wa baʿda hu ***
šahida ʿalà ḏālika *** wa muḥammadu bnu ʾaḥmada bni muḥammadi bni ʾaḥmada bni ʿīsà ăl ʾanṣāriyyu wa muḥammadu bnu ʿabdi ăl lāhi bni yaʿqūba wa muḥammadu bnu ṭalḥaẗa bni yaʿqūba bni ṭalḥaẗa wa ʿabdu ăs salāmi bnu yūsufa ***

...[?The king shall deign to grant] his demand for the call to prayer from minarets, prayer in the mosques, and the performance of the Friday sermon on Fridays, on feast days, and the like
[?The king shall not demand? an]y pack animals or any other obligations. However, if there is a revolt [fasād] in the territory from Valencia to Biar, he [the king] shall call them [i.e., the townsmen of Játiva] for military service for that purpose. [it is agreed] that they [the Jativans] shall be granted crown protection [?with respect to?]
[?person and chattels.?] ... There shall be no interference with regard to one's property. Any person from among the people of distinction and theiry leading men shall bei protected [wile traveling] by land and by sea and shall be escorted to his destination, whether [?territory?], [?regions?],
[?castles, citadels, cities, towns, coastlands, or harbors.?]. ... In lawsuits filed after the period [of the agreement] between them [the Muslims] and the Christians, one shall receive a judicial decision on the basis of testimony of two approved male witnesses, one Muslim and one Christian - but not on the basis of one male witness - and if there are more witnesses than that ...
... [?It is also agreed that one shall not be liable to punishment if?] he harbors a Muslim captive, but the captive shall be restored to his master if he is found. It is incumbent upon the king - may God support him! - to execute anyone who makes and attack on the Muslims. And if the attacker should be killed by a Muslim, [?the Muslim may not be killed?].
... The Muslims shall be responsible for construction on the citadel, and they may do as they like with respect to work on the outer wall of the city and on the city <wall>; they may not be compelled to do it, nor are they prohibited from doing so. [It is also agreed] that he [the ruler of Játiva] shall inform the king
[?about construction on the citadel and the walls ... It is also agreed that a tax (or taxes) shall be continued?] as before. He [he king] shall receive the tax on livestock according to the sunnah of the Muslims, [but] a certain qabālah-tax recently imposed on the markets for wall [maintenance] and the like shall not remain [in force] ...
... [The] king - may God support him! - [shall be bound to] this agreement by [all of] its articles, as shall the exalted queen, Dona Yoles. His son, the Infant Don Alfonso, and all of his descendants shall also be bound to it.
... [?and they shall take an oath of fidelity to it in al of?] the kingdom. By God Almighty; by the Cross and the Gospel; by all that by which perjury by the oath-taker is prohibited in his community. The king - may God support him! - and his successor the Infant, his son, and his successors shall undertake
[?all that has been specified. The two qāʾids - may God glorify them! shall be bound to this agreement by all of its articles. The people of distinction and the leading men of? J]átiva and its district [?shall also be bound to it?], and they shall make it binding on men of lower rank. They [i.e., the leadership of Játiva] shall take an oath of fidelity to it [the agreement]. By God, the Gen[erous; ?by Muḥammad his Messenger - may God bless him and grant him salvation!;?]
[?by the Koran which was revealed to him. The two qāyids - may God glorify them! - and all of their descendants ... shall undertake?] all that has been specified. By God, praise Him! The two qāʾids - may God glorify them! - and the rest of those present whose names are below attended [the proceedings] and drew up [this document]. [Issued on Sunday the] twen[ty-fifth of the month of Dhū al-Ḥiǧǧah]
[in the year 641 (5 June 1244) ... and] that belongs to the king - may God support him! The Muslims shall retain possession of their Christian captives during the period [of the agreement] and after it, [and] they [the captives] shall not object [to this] during [the period of the agreement and after it.] ...
[?Witnessed by?] [first name], Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad Ibn ʿìsá al-Anṣārī, Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn Yaʿqūb, Muḥammad ibn Ṭalḥah ibn Yaʿqūb ibn Ṭalḥah (?), and ʿAbd al-Salām ibn Yūsuf ...
